Usage.Synopsis: Run Robocopy.exe with native PowerShell Support.

Description: See https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc733145(v=ws.11).aspx for an extensive documentation on Robocopy switches.

Parameters.Name: Source
Parameters.Description: Source Directory (drive:\path or \\server\share\path).

Parameters.Name: Destination
Parameters.Description: Destination Dir (drive:\path or \\server\share\path).

Parameters.Name: Files
Parameters.Description: File(s) to copy  (names/wildcards: default is '*.*'').

Parameters.Name: IncludeSubDirectories
Parameters.Description: copy Subdirectories, but not empty ones.

Parameters.Name: IncludeEmptySubDirectories
Parameters.Description: copy subdirectories, including Empty ones.

Parameters.Name: Level
Parameters.Description: only copy the top n LEVels of the source directory tree.

Parameters.Name: RestartMode
Parameters.Description: copy files in restartable mode.

Parameters.Name: BackupMode
Parameters.Description: copy files in Backup mode.

Parameters.Name: RestartBackupMode
Parameters.Description: use restartable mode; if access denied use Backup mode.

Parameters.Name: UnbufferedIOMode
Parameters.Description: copy using unbuffered I/O (recommended for large files).

Parameters.Name: EFSRAW
Parameters.Description: copy all encrypted files in EFS RAW mode.

Parameters.Name: CopyFlags
Parameters.Description: What to COPY for files (default is /COPY:DAT). (copyflags : D=Data, A=Attributes, T=Timestamps, X=Skip alt data streams). (S=Security=NTFS ACLs, O=Owner info, U=aUditing info).

Parameters.Name: DCopyFlags
Parameters.Description: What to COPY for files (default is /COPY:DA). (copyflags : D=Data, A=Attributes, T=Timestamps).

Parameters.Name: SEC
Parameters.Description: copy files with SECurity (equivalent to /COPY:DATS).

Parameters.Name: COPYALL
Parameters.Description: COPY ALL file info (equivalent to /COPY:DATSOU).

Parameters.Name: NoCopy
Parameters.Description: COPY NO file info (useful with /PURGE).

Parameters.Name: SecFix
Parameters.Description: FIX file SECurity on all files, even skipped files.

Parameters.Name: TimFix
Parameters.Description: FIX file TIMes on all files, even skipped files.

Parameters.Name: Purge
Parameters.Description: delete dest files/dirs that no longer exist in source.

Parameters.Name: Mirror
Parameters.Description: MIRror a directory tree (equivalent to /E plus /PURGE).

Parameters.Name: Mov
Parameters.Description: MOVe files (delete from source after copying).

Parameters.Name: Move
Parameters.Description: MOVE files AND dirs (delete from source after copying).

Parameters.Name: AddAttribute
Parameters.Description: Add the given Attributes to copied files. R = Read only, A = Archive, S = System, H = Hidden, C = Compressed, N = Not content indexed,E = Encrypted, T = Temporary

Parameters.Name: RemoveAttribute
Parameters.Description: Remove the given Attributes from copied files. R = Read only, A = Archive, S = System, H = Hidden, C = Compressed, N = Not content indexed,E = Encrypted, T = Temporary
